Class Piece

java.lang.Object

                      Piece
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class Piece
extends javax.swing.JButton

class Piece is a modified JButton with X and Y coordinates added, as well as a listener. It extends JButton

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Sergei Levashov
See Also:
API, Serialized Form
